parameters: Uh, Merc, there's someone in the way.
Well, that's something you don't see every day. Someone's got
F-Forsooth! Though mine ears are submerged under several
inches of soil, I sense the presence of two heroes nearby!
Oh! She's talking! Are you okay, uh...
I am but a wandering Page, looking for the guidance of a
knight so that I may become a legendary warrior of the
However, as you can see, I was bested by a fearsome
beast and proceeded to fall down a completely unreasonably
It, uh, looks pretty reasonable to me. You sure you didn't
P-perish the thought! You would do well not to underestimate
the beast that put me in so grim a situation!
Merc, I feel bad talking to her like this, can we pull her
It's morning? But I could've sworn the sun was shining in
the west when I got stuck.
Let's just hope that you're really bad at directions...
A-Ahem! Adventurers! Many thanks for assisting me out of
that terrible bind! I understand that you both  must
have plenty of experience with predicaments such as those!
Might the two of you have any food to spare? I can't remember the
last time since I had a good bite to eat.
Sure, I've got some bread here. I always keep some handy.
I'll have you know, people often say I have the appetite of
a warrior, even when I haven't been stuck in a hole without food
Well, it has been quite the enjoyable experience, but for
I-IT'S THE FABLED BOXING RABBIT OF GRAVELTON WOODS!
THIS FOUL BEAST WAS THE ONE THAT ATTACKED ME AND DOOMED ME
LET'S SEE HOW WELL YOU FARE NOW THAT I AM AT THE \{BOTTOM\}
Oops. Sorry, Mr. Bunny, didn't mean to scare you.
Must've been some leftovers from yesterday, huh, Merc?
Y-you scared off the beast without even so much as laying a
I wouldn't really call that a beast...
Y-You must be the legendary knight I've been searching for!
That's right! A warrior with an aura so powerful that those
not worthy enough crumble beneath their presence!
Wait... And if I haven't crumbled beneath your presence...
I've been waiting my entire life for this day...
I just have so many questions I need to ask...
What do you do to get stronger?!
How many thousands of monsters have you slain?!
I don't like that last one.
Oops, I forgot that one was only if the legendary hero was
You're not a man, are you?
HAHA! This is hilarious! You really think \{SHE'S\} a
"Legendary Warrior?!" Sure, a maybe a threat to every dinner
WHAT DID YOU SAY, FOOL?! YOU DARE MOCK HER TO HER FACE?!
No, uh, Page! It's fine! I just think that he's trying to
say that I'm probably not that super duper cool hero that
you're thinking of. I'm just some villager named Autumn.
But, uh... It's really cool you think so, haha! I mean, I
guess I really do seem like an amazing warrior, teehee!
But I can lend you some advice if you DO wanna be an awesome
adventurer! My number one tip is to always keep your belly
full! No adventurer or warrior is complete without a full
tummy ready to take on the world!
W-woah... I'd never thought about that before...
In that case, I vow to consistently maintain a full belly
Autumn and company decide not to walk into the giant black hole
Must've been a slip of the tongue. Er, the mind.
A pile of wood. Why is it here?
Maybe someone was trying to cover up the hole in the wall.
